name: youtube-video-id-fetcher
description: A small module to fetch the youtube id, given any url to take into consideration

scripts.test: find ./tests -name '*spec.js' | xargs nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha -R spec --require babel-core/register
scripts.coveralls: find ./tests -name '*spec.js' | xargs nyc --reporter=text-lcov mocha -R spec --require babel-core/register | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.ci_tests: find ./tests -name '*spec.js' | xargs nyc --reporter=text mocha -R spec --require babel-core/register

author: Amir Ali Jiwani <amirali.jiwani89@gmail.com>
